objective: Analyze HR data to understand key factors behind employee attrition, satisfaction, and performance. Visualize insights and build predictive models.

steps.title: Import Libraries & Load Dataset
steps.description: Import necessary libraries such as pandas, numpy, matplotlib, seaborn, and load the CSV file into a DataFrame.

steps.title: Data Overview
steps.description: Use df.head(), df.info(), df.describe(), and df.shape to understand the basic structure of the data.

steps.title: Data Cleaning
steps.description: Check for null values, duplicate rows, and fix inconsistent data if any.

steps.title: Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
steps.description: Visualize key features such as satisfaction level, average monthly hours, and attrition. Use histograms, boxplots, and barplots to uncover patterns.

steps.title: Correlation Analysis
steps.description: Plot a heatmap to understand the correlation between numerical variables and attrition.

steps.title: Feature Engineering
steps.description: Convert categorical variables like salary and department using label encoding or one-hot encoding.

steps.title: Model Building
steps.description: Split data into training and testing sets. Train models like Logistic Regression and Random Forest to predict attrition.

steps.title: Model Evaluation
steps.description: Evaluate the model using accuracy, confusion matrix, precision, recall, and classification report.

steps.title: Final Insights
steps.description: Summarize key takeaways for HR teams to understand and address employee attrition and satisfaction.
